title: Magic Research 2
description: Experience the long-awaited sequel to Magic Research. In Magic Research 2, you are a rookie wizard with a single ambition: to find or create the Philosopherâ€™s Stone, a legendary magical item that is said to be able to cure any illness. As you do so, you will learn more than you ever imagined about Magic and about the world around you. What kinds of adventures await you? Survival: Fountain of Youth
